closed.heading: Ticket closed
closed.paragraph: You closed your Ticket and therefore marked your issue as resolved.

ticket.no_open_tickets: At the moment there are no open support tickets
ticket.no_closed_tickets: At the moment there are no closed support tickets
ticket.create_cta: If you have any questions or issues don"t hesitate to contact our support team.
ticket.create_step_1_header: What can we help you with?
ticket.create_step_1_sub: By choosing the topic you want to create a support ticket about, our support team can help you faster and more targeted.
ticket.concern_server: Request regarding one of my servers
ticket.concern_payment: Request regarding one of my payments
ticket.create_step_2_server_sub: Please choose the server your request is about in the list below and try to describe your issue as precise as possible.
ticket.create_step_2_payment_sub: Please choose the payment your request is about in the list below and try to describe your issue as precise as possible.
ticket.create_step_3_sub: Please choose an expressive subject for your request and describe what you need help with or regarding which topic you have questsions.
ticket.affected_server_no_servers: Looks like you didn"t order a server, yet.
ticket.affected_payment_no_payments: Looks like you didn"t charge your account, yet.
ticket.too_many_requests_header: Submitting your request has been failed
ticket.too_many_requests_text: It seems as you"ve tried to submit your issue quite often in the last 60 seconds. Please try again in:
ticket.subject: Subject
